text: Headlines: The U.S. FDA convened a panel to decide whether or not to approve the #PfizerBioNTech #COVID19 #vaccine. It met a day after a record-breaking 3,100 people died in the US in a 24-hour period. @KPFA & Free Speech TV (3 pm PT), @KPFK (4 pm PT), https://t.co/36KL8tuYa9 https://t.co/Vfcv6ehvQ7
